text: Aleksandr Belov (born 11 September 1981) is a Russian ski jumper. He competed in the normal hill and large hill events at the 2002 Winter Olympics. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:Living people Category:Russian male ski jumpers Category:Olympic ski jumpers of Russia Category:Ski jumpers at the 2002 Winter Olympics Category:Sportspeople from Ufa
title: Aleksandr Belov (ski jumper)
